properties.name: Bajonetstaat 16, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey block-shaped corner structure with rectangular floor plan. Hipped roof with finials. Cornice over all façades. Front façade with four windows on first floor and alternating doors and windows on ground floor. Weather mouldings above openings.
properties.monument_value: Value as part of an urban townscape and esthetical value because of the prominent corner situation. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Bajonetstraat 18-20, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Prominent building with out- buildings and walled-in yard. Hipped roof with finials over main structure and lean-to roof over one-storey rear gallery. Heavy cornice and horizontal moulded band over façades. Front façade: door and windows with weather mouldings laid out in five vertical axes, quoins on corners.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical, cultural historical and esthetical value as a prominent monumental building with outbuildings and old trees in large, walled-in yard. Specific value part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Bajonetstraat 19-23, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with workers' dwellings. One continuous lean-to roof. Front façade ranging with the street. Three doors and small windows. Two kitchen sites with chimney at rear side.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of modest urban housing with a traditional design. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Bajonetstraat 2-4, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey urban structure. Gable roof with triangular dormers on both sides of roof. Plain gables with tall window and oculus in moulded star. Profiled cornice over all façades. Front façade: three doors flanked by tall windows. Front balcony. Walled fence with front entrance.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the typical triangular dormers. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Bajonetstraat 3-7, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure. Low hipped roof. Profiled cornice over all façades. Full frontage horizontal profiled moulding and band between openings of ground and first floor. Typical corner details: curved corner on ground floor changing into rectangular corner on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of typical corner details. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Bajonetstraat 9-15, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached block of four one-storey structures. One continuous hipped roof. Cornice and full frontage horizontal band above openings. Front façade ranging with the street. Regular lay-out of alternating doors and windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of modest urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Registers of Monuments

properties.name: Bellevue (Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound)
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Main building of a walled- in corral compound. Composite floor and roof plan with mainly hipped roofs with dormers. Profiled cornice over all façades. Front façade: first floor with symmetrical lay-out, centrally placed dormer with triangular fronton and cheeks, central balcony and door flanked by two, paired, tall windows with semicircular fanlights and mouldings, dentate quoins on corners. Ground floor, marble tablet with inscription 'Ao 1875 N51'. Typical wooden balconies on main and additional structures. Additional two-storey structure with pyramidal roof and former cistern on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and scientific value because of the neo-classicist architecture with characteristics typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the typical wooden balconies. Architectural historical and loca

properties.name: Belvédère
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey cube-shaped structure. Two hipped roofs with ridges parallel to square. Profiled, heavy cornice topped with low parapet on front and side façades. Front façade symmetrically laid out. Central balcony supported by two double columns forming a portico. Full-frontage terrace and U-shaped block of stairs. Dentate quoins on corners. First floor: door to balcony with two windows on both sides. Ground floor: door with two pairs of coupled windows on both sides, topped with triangular fronton and flanked with columns.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value as an example of a cube-shaped building with a portico and characteristic classical details. Cultural historical value as the former residence of Governor de Rouville who commissioned the construction in 1864-
properties.construction_period: Around 1866

properties.name: Belvédèrestraat 13, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey dwelling. Hipped roofs over core area and front gallery. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades, pilasters on front corners. Front façade with central door and flanking windows provided with weather mouldings. Short front terrace, fence with pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core area and gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Belvédèrestraat 34-36, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey U-shaped structure containing two dwellings. Main building and two rear wings covered with hipped roofs. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over façades, plastered dentate quoins on front corners. Front façade with doors and flanking windows for each unit.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditional double- family dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Belvédèrestraat 44, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached one-storey dwelling in side alley. Gable roof. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and oculus. Front façade with central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditional dwelling with gable roof enclosed by typical 19th century funnel-shaped gables. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Belvédèrestraat 45, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached structure, main building of a corral. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Three dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top end, oculus and text 'A 1885'. Front façade with cornice and central door with flanking windows. Front addition and short front terrace. Kitchen and cistern next to rear gallery.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the funnel- shaped gables, dormers, cornices and windows with weather mouldings. Architectural historical and cultural historical value as part of the old corral-structure of this area of Otrobanda and becaus

properties.name: Belvédèrestraat 46, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached one-storey dwelling. Gable roof. Plain19th century funnel-shaped gables with oculus. Front façade with (probably former) central door and flanking windows. Kitchen section with oven chimney at rear side.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditional dwelling with gable roof enclosed by typical 19th century funnel-shaped gables. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Belvédèrestraat 48, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small one-storey corner dwelling with a rectangular and L- shaped block. Hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade with central door and windows, profiled cornice and pilasters on corners.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a traditional dwelling covered with hipped roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Belvédèrestraat 49, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey dwelling. Three parallel hipped roofs, small hipped roof over kitchen. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade with central door and flanking windows. Kitchen with chimney. Detached covered cistern in backyard. Fence with square stone pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural and cultural historical value as an example of a traditional medium-sized dwelling covered with hipped roofs. Ditto because of cistern in backyard. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First quarter of 20th century.

properties.name: Belvédèrestraat 5, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Building is part of corral Frederikstraat 102. Front façade with cornice and corner pilasters. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value as a building which is part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral- structure typical of this area of Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Belvédèrestraat 52-54, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large cube-shaped two-storey corner structure with almost square floor plan. Two parallel hipped roofs of different width. Roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front and rear façades laid out with openings in one and three vertical axes for the small and large hipped roof sections respectively. Walled-in backyard with pedestrian gate.
properties.monument_value: Architectural and cultural historical value as a typical example of a large two-storey urban structure containing a number of dwellings. Ditto because of walled-in yard with pedestrian gate. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th century

properties.name: Belvédèrestraat 6, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-and-a-half storey dwelling covered with a gable roof, gallery covered with a slant roof. Front façade with central panelled shutter door and flanking shutter windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditional dwelling with gable roof enclosed by typical 19th century funnel-shaped gables. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Belvédèrestraat 7, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey dwelling. Hipped roofs over core area and front gallery. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all facades, pilasters on corners. Front façade with central panelled shutter door and flanking shutter windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of such elements as the cornice and the wooden shutter door and shutter windows with weather mouldings. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core area and gallery typi
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Bonairestraat 12, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey dwelling with ridge of gable roof parallel to the street Front façade with flat cornice, central door and flanking windows. Short front terrace with concrete fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a modest dwelling covered with a gable roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Bonairestraat 13, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey dwelling. Ridge of hipped roof parallel to the street. Cement hips and ridge with finials. Cornice over facades. Front façade ranging with street, central shutter door and flanking shutter windows for each unit.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a traditional dwelling covered with a hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Bonairestraat 14, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey dwelling. Gable roof with ridge parallel to the street. Gables with shoulders and finials as top decoration. Front façade with profiled cornice, central door and flanking windows. Short front terrace with concrete fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a modest dwelling covered with a gable roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th century

properties.name: Bonairestraat 22, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey dwelling with elevated ground floor. Three parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades. Front façade with door and flanking windows, pilasters on corners. Covered front verandah with double stairs in a symmetrical setting.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a traditional dwelling covered with hipped roofs. Ditto because of additional rear building, presumably the former cistern. Specific value as part of a protected monumental tow
properties.construction_period: First quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Bonairestraat 24-26, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached block containing two small dwellings, each dwelling covered by a hipped roof perpendicular to the street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades. Front façade with door and window for each unit. Fence with pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a modest double dwelling covered with hipped roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Bonairestraat 27-33, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached block of four small row-houses positioned perpendicular to the street. One continuous gable roof. Street façade: plain funnel-shaped gable ranging with the street, clamped central door and ditto flanking windows. East façade with three small doors and three windows. Two roof chimneys.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical set of low-income row-houses built under one roof. Ditto because of typical fence columns against the façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Bonairestraat 34, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey dwelling. Hipped roof parallel to the street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice on front façade only. Front façade with central shutter door and flanking shutter windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a small traditional dwelling covered with a hipped roof. Ditto because of the typical additional building. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Bonairestraat 35, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey dwelling. Two hipped roofs parallel to street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Plain, flat cornice over all façades. Front façade ranging with street. Central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a small traditional dwelling covered with hipped roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Bonairestraat 36, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner building covered with two parallel hipped roofs. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Slant roof over rear gallery. Cornice over façades. Front façade ranging with street. Central door and flanking windows. Roof chimney at rear gallery.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a small traditional dwelling with hipped roof and rear gallery. Ditto because of the oven and the chimney, and the additional building. Specific value as part of a protected mo
properties.construction_period: First quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Bonairestraat 37, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey dwelling covered with a hipped roof perpendicular to the street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade ranging with street. Central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a modest dwelling equipped with a hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Bonairestraat 6-8, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached block containing two small dwellings, each dwelling covered with a plain gable roof with ridges perpendicular to the street. Front façade ranging with the street. Door with steps to street for each unit.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a modest double dwelling structure covered with gable roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th

properties.name: Bonairestraat 9-11, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached block of two small one-storey twin dwellings. Each dwelling covered with a separate hipped roof with cement hips and ridges. Slant roof over rear gallery. Cornice on front façade only. Front façade ranging with the street, central door and flanking windows for each unit.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as two simultaneously built traditional dwellings with hipped roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Breedestraat 104, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached three-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and finials over rectangular floor plan. Cornice over all façades. Front and side façade laid out in three axes. Windows and doors provided with arched fanlights and mouldings. Full-frontage balcony and horizontal band over front façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a characteristic three-storey urban dwelling with typical windows and balcony doors. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Second half of 19th century

properties.name: Breedestraat 109-111, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof and adjoining slant roof with high end directed to the street. Front façade with central medallion placed between cornice and horizontal band. Central door and flanking windows topped with horizontal band and blind arches. Balcony over full frontage of façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the decorative elements on the front façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 111A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over two-storey core and lean-to roof over one-storey front gallery. Plain funnel- shaped gables. Front façade: cornice on core and gallery façade, two shutter windows on core façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 115-117, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large semi-detached two-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Two parallel gable roofs and transverse ditto roofs. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Oculus in decorated star. Front façade: cornice, three doors flanked with two windows. Full-frontage balcony over façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the 19th century funnel-shaped gables with 1862 mark. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 120, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small one-storey structure built against adjoining properties. Ridge parallel to street. Gable roofs over T- shaped floor plan. Main gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Two front dormers with windows topped by a triangular fronton and moulded rims.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Ditto because of age of building and the typical dormers. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: 18th / 19th Century

properties.name: Breedestraat 125-127, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large two-storey detached structure with ridges parallel to street. Three parallel hipped roofs over rectangular floor plan. Heavy cornice over all façades. Front façade with centrally positioned triangular dormer with oculus in star decoration. Central door flanked with two pairs of two sash windows with glass bars. Full-frontage balcony over façade. .
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. characteristic cornice topped with the typical central triangular dormer. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 137-141, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gables with plain top end. Front façade: cornice, three central doors flanked by two windows. Full- frontage balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 151-153, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street . Gable roof over rectangular floor plan. Heavy cornice continuing round the façades. Pointed gables. Front façade: central door flanked by two windows. Full frontage balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical triangular gable and the heavy cornice. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 155-157, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large semi-detached two-storey structure made up of a main section and flanking one-and two-storey sections. Main section with gable roof with gable and hipped end perpendicular to street. Gable with full-frontage moulding topped with a semicircular fronton. Balcony and arched leaded fanlights above balcony doors and windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of the characteristic and unique architecture supported by a typical ornamentation with contrasting colours. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 163-165, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached block of two adjoining one-storey buildings with two identical street façades. Gable roofs perpendicular to street. Inward and outward curved gables with semicircular gable tops.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because the characteristic inward and outward curved gables. Uniqueness value as the sole known example of rich 18th century gable architecture used for modest structures. Specific value as part of a protected
properties.construction_period: 18th Century

properties.name: Breedestraat 167-169, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Two parallel hipped roofs. Heavy cornice over front and side façades. Pilasters on corners of first floor. Front façade with central panelled shutter door flanked with two tall shutter windows. Central front balcony and wooden side terrace.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because a.o. the characteristic wooden side terrace. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 17, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey detached structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over main section and slant roofs over adjoining front and rear galleries. Forms one structure with Breedestraat 17A. Front façade with profiled cornice and dentate quoin on corner, openings with weather mouldings. Front balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of 18th century funnel-shaped gable and dormer with inward and outward curved top. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core area and front and rear gal
properties.construction_period: 18th Century

properties.name: Breedestraat 170-172, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi detached two-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Three parallel gable roofs over core area and galleries. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century gable ends. Heavy cornice over front and side façade. Typical 19th century architectural details.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the 19th century funnel-shaped gables, the heavy cornice over façades, the weather mouldings of windows and the quoins. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because the floor plan typical of Cura
properties.construction_period: 19th Century

properties.name: Breedestraat 171-173, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached three-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials. Heavy cornice across front and side façades. Front façade laid out in three axes: shutter windows on second floor and shutter doors on first floor. Full frontage wooden balcony and profiled pilasters on corners.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because a.o. of the characteristic balcony typical of Breedestraat, Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 174
properties.characteristics: Small one-storey structure, part of a semi-detached block of two identical structures. Ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Dormer with triangular fronton and window on both sides of roof. Plain cornice over front façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical dormer. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 176, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small one-storey structure, part of a semi-detached block of two identical structures. Ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Dormer with triangular fronton and window on both sides of roof. Plain cornice over front façade. Side entrance gate with pointed gable.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical dormer. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 17A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey detached structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over main section and slant roofs over adjoining front and rear galleries. Forms one structure with Breedestraat 17. Front façade with profiled cornice and dentate quoin on corner, openings with weather mouldings. Front balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of 18th century funnel-shaped gable and dormer with inward and outward curved top. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of floor plan with core area and front and rear galleri
properties.construction_period: 18th Century

properties.name: Breedestraat 180-182, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey building as the eastern part of a large detached structure. Ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Inward and outward curved gable with arched top. Front façade with five tall shutter windows and wooden front balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of typical 18th century gable, and the wooden balcony. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: 18th Century

properties.name: Breedestraat 183-185, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: One-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. Gable roof parallel to Breedestraat. Front façade with heavy cornice and three doors with weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Typical one-storey structure of modest architecture with an elongated roof facing the street. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 184-186, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey building as the western part of a large detached structure. Ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Inward and outward curved gable with arched top. Front balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of typical 18th century gable and dormer, and the wooden balcony. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental
properties.construction_period: 18th Century

properties.name: Breedestraat 187, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey corner structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roofs at the front side and hipped roofs at the rear side. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century gable tops and half oculus. Front façade: cornice and three tall windows on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the 19th century gables and the composite system of roofs typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 188, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Typical small semi-detached one-storey structure built on narrow and deep lot. Oblong gable roof. Front façade: funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end. Wide opening with weather moulding on ground floor closed with panelled doors with side lights. Side gate with access to backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the typical 19th century gable. Cultural historical value as a building which is part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral-structure typical of Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a protected mon
properties.construction_period: 19th Century

properties.name: Breedestraat 192 A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached one-storey structure situated on off-street premises. Major building of a corral. Core area with galleries on three sides. Three dormers on both sides of roof. Elevated front terrace. Access from Breedestraat through typical arched alleyway.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of floor plan with core area and galleries typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical value because of a.o. panelled doors and shutter-windows, front terrace with 'Ysselsteen' pavement and a
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 34-38, Otrobanda

properties.name: Brionweg 21-23, Otrobanda

Façade with cornice and corner pilasters on a base, and weather mouldings above door and windows. Small detached addition with hipped roof at rear side (nr. 21).

properties.name: Casablanca
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey monumental structure set back from street. Main building of corral originally fully surrounded by additional buildings at edges of corral. U- shaped floor plan enclosing a patio. Two parallel hipped roofs over front section, gable roofs over rear wings. Heavy profiled and fully decorated projecting cornice on consoles over façades, dentate quoins on corners. Front façade laid out in seven axes. Central section with triangular fronton above cornice; front balcony above portico with double columns on front platform with steps. Front fence with footing wall and bars set between pillars. Central front gate between fluted pillars, two additional gates on both sides. Fully restored as Civil Registry (restoration awarded with Carfibbean prize for best restoration architecture).
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the symmetrical set-up of the front façade with central section in particular and the monumental character of structure and fence. Cultural historical value as the main building of one of the few existing exa
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Charlottestraat 1-5, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-and-a-half storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and slant roof over adjoining two-storey east gallery. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gables marked with year of construction. External oven and chimney. Front façade ranging with the street, six tall windows on first floor and three alternating doors and windows on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a large two-storey urban dwelling. Ditto because of funnel-shaped gables marked with the year of construction and the typical external oven. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townsca

properties.construction_period: 18th Century

properties.name: Dwergsteeg 5-11, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure. Gable roofs with dormers over core area and rear gallery and slant roof over adjoining front gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with triangular fronton at top end and ellipse-shaped oculus. Front façade ranging with the street, three doors on ground floor and four windows on first floor. Full-frontage horizontal bands.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core area and galleries typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: El Diamante
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end and oculus. Full-frontage horizontal band over front façade. Forms one large structure with Breedestraat 48.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the typical floor plan with core area and gallery. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Elleboogstraat 2, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey block-shaped structure with ridge perpendicular to alley. Hipped roof over rectangular floor plan. Cornice and horizontal band over façades. Front façade with two tall windows on first floor and door on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Typical structure with a characteristic sober architecture. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Emmastraat 10-14, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure. Two hipped roofs parallel to street. Profiled cornice over façades. Front façade laid out in five axes with central door flanked by two windows on both sides, on ground and first floor. Wooden front balcony in centre. Short front terrace with pillared fence. Stone staircase to first floor on side façade. Adjacent to main structure: detached two-storey structure with high end of slant roof on streetside.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the symmetrical façade lay-out, windows with moulded frames, wooden balcony and heavy cornice. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Emmastraat 16, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure. Long gable roof with a gable in the middle and at the roof's ends. No cornice. Heavy rainstorms destroyed the corner section in 1999.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a typical example of urban low-cost housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Emmastraat 25, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-and-a-half storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Gable roof enclosed by gables with shoulders, 19th century top end with oculus in star-shaped plasterwork. Roof with two dormers on each side. Front façade: tall window in gable, door and window on ground floor. Small walled fence on both sides of façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical shoulder gables, moulding and oculus. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: 19th Century

properties.name: Emmastraat 5-7, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Gable roof enclosed by funnel- shaped gables with ellipse-shaped oculus. Formerly equipped with lower gables. In backyard almost similar structure with ditto gables and 19th century top end with semicircular oculus. Door in front façade. Front wall with pointed gable over gate.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Emmastraat 6-8, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Two hipped roofs parallel to street. Profiled cornice over façades. Front façade: five tall windows on first floor, central door and flanking windows in two pairs. On side of street a cistern with flat roof accessible by a stone staircase with balustrade.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 10-12, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Two hipped roofs parallel to street. Cornice continuing round façades, dentate quoins on corners. Front façade laid out in three axes with central door and flanking windows, central wooden balcony with balusters of fretwork. Façade flanked with two gates with triangular frontons. Walled-in garden and extra gate.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value a.o. because of such elements as the balcony with typical details, the dentate quoins and the gates. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 11, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Gable roof perpendicular to street. Front façade: funnel-shaped gable with plain 19th century top end and oculus, shutter door and window. Building is part of a group of two similar structures (nr.9) separated by a gate giving access to the premises.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as part of two similar low- cost row-houses. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: 19th Century

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 14-16, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-and-a-half storey structure. Gable roof parallel to street and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Two dormers on each side of roof. Pointed gable with shoulders, rhombic oculus and truncated top with knob ornament. Front façade with cornice, central door and flanking windows with weather mouldings. Side entrance with gate with triangular fronton.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the typical gable with shoulders and 19th century top end. Cultural historical and architectural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a prote
properties.construction_period: 19th Century

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 15-17, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Hipped roof with ridge perpendicular to street. Heavy cornice over all façades, dentate quoins on corners. Front façade with two doors and window on ground floor. Structure is flanked by two gates with triangular frontons.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the cornice and the dentate quoins. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 26, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials. Façade with heavy cornice, fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade with central door and windows with weather mouldings and typical ornaments. Front fence with stone pillars and bars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the hipped roof with cement hips and ridge, the fine decorations on the cornice, the profiled pilasters and the fence with pillars. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: 19th Century

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 3, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-and-a-half storey structure. Gable roof perpendicular to street. Dormers with inward and outward curved fronton on both sides of roof. Profiled cornice and horizontal band over façades. Front façade with pointed shoulder gable and truncated top with knob ornament and rhombic oculus. Central door with flanking windows on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the typical gable and characteristic dormers. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: 19th Century

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 30, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over side gallery. Front façade: door in core and window in gallery façade. Side façade: plain cornice, central door and two flanking windows on each side.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical and architectural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 33-39, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure containing four row-houses. One continuous gable roof with side overhangs, ridge perpendicular to street. Plain funnel-shaped gables. Building is part of a group of two similar structures (nr. 43-47)
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the sporadically found side overhangs, and as part of complex with adjacent similar low-cost row-houses. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of monuments

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 43-47, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure containing three row-houses. One continuous gable roof with side overhangs, ridge perpendicular to street. Plain funnel-shaped gables. Building is part of a group of two similar structures (nr. 33-39)
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the sporadically found side overhangs, and as part of complex with adjacent similar low-cost row-houses. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 49, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel- shaped gables with flat moulding and plain 19th century top end. Front façade with central door and flanking windows with plain weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Town planning and architectural historical value because of prominent corner position. Cultural historical and architectural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 5, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached one story structure with side entrance to premises. Gable roof parallel to street. Roof on one side closed by funnel-shaped gable with flat moulding and 19th century top end. Front façade with door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical gable with 19th century top end. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: 19th Century

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 6A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-and-a-half storey structure. Gable roof parallel to street. Dormers with triangular fronton on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gable with shoulders, oculus and truncated top and knob ornament. Front façade with central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the typical gable with shoulders and 19th century top end. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 8, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached one-storey structure. Low gable roof parallel to street on one side closed by truncated funnel- shaped gable with semicircular top end. Front façade with shutter door and window. Gate as a side entrance to premises.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical and architectural historical value as a typical example of a low-cost urban dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 9, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Gable roof perpendicular to street. Front façade: funnel-shaped gable with plain 19th century top end and oculus, shutter door and window. Building is part of a group of two similar structures (nr.11) separated by a gate giving access to the premises.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as part of adjacent similar low-cost row-houses. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: 19th Century

properties.name: Fergusonstraat 2-4, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey block made up of two dwelling structures. Two parallel hipped roofs. Profiled cornice and horizontal belt over façades, plain pilasters on corners. Façade surface with appearance of rustic work of piled blocks. Staircase and balcony newly added elements.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of two-storey urban housing with hipped roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First half of 20th century

properties.name: Fergusonstraat 22, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Hipped roof with slate roofing and eaves gutter on brackets. Wooden balcony on front façade. Façades: rustic work of piled concrete blocks and three plain horizontal belts, two above openings on ground and first floor and one at balcony level.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a two-storey concrete-built urban house with hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First half of 20th century

properties.name: Fergusonstraat 24, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey concrete-built corner structure. Hipped roof. Plain rectangular floor plan with kitchen addition. Cement hips and ridge with finials. Shutter doors with side lights and shutter windows. Openings with plastered frame.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a concrete-built urban house with hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First half of 20th century

properties.name: Fergusonstraat 9-11, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Hipped roof parallel to street. Cornice and horizontal band over façades. Weather mouldings on pseudo consoles above all openings. Panelled shutter doors and shutter windows. Front façade: lay-out with five axes and divided in three sections by pilasters. Central section with concrete balcony and consoles. West façade: staircase to first floor and concrete openwork balustrade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the classical façade lay-out with axes, the cornice, pilasters and weather mouldings and the balcony, all concrete elements. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Florencestraat 9, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Two hipped roofs with overhangs. Cement hips and finials. Front section is a wooden structure, rear section is stone-built. Front façade with central door and flanking shutter windows, balcony with stone openwork balustrade and two stairs to street.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the rarely found roof overhangs and the wooden façades. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Four Alley complex
properties.characteristics: Compact complex of five small dwellings enclosed by four alleys: Van Dijksteeg, Zaantjessteeg, Martinsteeg and Schrijnwerkerstraat. One and two-storey structures with inner yards. Complex dominated by central two-storey core structure with hipped roof and one-storey side galleries with lean-to roofs. Other structures include a.o. dwellings with core area and galleries covered with gable roofs and slant roofs enclosed with funnel-shaped gables with classical top end. Complex enclosed with high stone wall with gates to small inner yards.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic assembly of larger and smaller blocks. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and galleries typical of Curaçao (Van Dijkst
properties.construction_period: Not listed inn Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 101-103, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-and-a-half storey corner structure accommodating two row-houses. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped separation walls and gable with shoulders and 19th century top. Oven and chimney in backyard of dwelling.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao which is scarce in this part of the town. Ditto because of the typical oven. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: 1856 (marked in gable top)

properties.name: Frederikstraat 102, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Main structure of corral. Detached structure with gable roof and adjoining slant roof over two-storey core area and front gallery. One-storey rear gallery covered with slant roof. Funnel-shaped gables with oculus and 19th century top end. Front façade laid out in three axes with windows on first floor and central door and flanking windows on ground floor. Front terrace flanked with stone benches.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the 19th century funnel-shaped gables, cornice and wooden shutter doors and windows. Ditto because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Cultural historical value as a building which is part of one of the few
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 108-112, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached structure. Three-storey core area with gable roof. Rear gallery roof separated by a two-storey balcony section. Two-storey front gallery with slant roof. Front gallery façade laid out in five vertical axes with three doors opening to a front balcony on columns. Loggia with staircase access on side façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the dormers, the façade lay-out with doors and windows positioned in five axes, the cornice and mouldings, the wooden shutter doors and windows and the fence of the premises. Architectural hist
properties.construction_period: 1852 (marked in eastern gable)

properties.name: Frederikstraat 109-111, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Gable roof parallel to street. Front façade with doors and windows positioned in three axes and topped with a triangular fronton. Profiled cornice along façades.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical two-storey urban structure with a gable roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First half of 20th century

properties.name: Frederikstraat 109A -109B, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey behind Frederikstraat 109. Gable roof enclosed by funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Roof with overhangs. Balcony removed.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical two-storey urban structure with gable roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Second half of 19th century

properties.name: Frederikstraat 117-119, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large semi-detached two-storey structure. Two parallel hipped roofs and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Front façade originally laid out with central door and flanking windows on ground and first floor. Concrete balcony probably replacement of wooden one.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a spacious two-storey urban dwelling covered with hipped roofs. Ditto because structure is situated between two alleys. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Second half of 19th century

properties.name: Frederikstraat 123, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey structure. Two parallel hipped roofs with ridges parallel to street. Cornice over façades. Front façade with shutter windows and doors positioned in four axes. Front concrete balcony probably replacement of wooden one.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a spacious two-storey urban dwelling covered with hipped roofs. Ditto because structure is situated along an alleyway and on a square. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Second half of 19th century

properties.name: Frederikstraat 127-133, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached one-and-a-half storey structure. Typical oblong floor plan parallel to street. Gable roof over core area. Slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Inward and outward curved gables with profiled mouldings. Five dormers with inward and outward curved gables on each side of gable roof. Front façade laid out in nine vertical axes. Openings topped with arches in block pattern connected with moulded bands. Seriously damaged by fire in 1999.
properties.monument_value: Nr. 127-131: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Ditto because of its age, as a rare 18th century house and the characteristic gable roofs, mouldings and terrace stairs. Specific value as pa
properties.construction_period: 18th / 19th Century

properties.name: Frederikstraat 128-132, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over gallery enclosed by gables with oculus. Roof chimney on east side. Entrance gate at Frederikstraat with stone pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because a.o. the typical gables, dormer, chimney and the fence of the premises with pillars and profiled top. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific valu
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 146-148, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Main building of a corral which also includes the structures Naniesteeg 6-22. Detached corner structure. One-and-a-half storey core area. Gable roof with three dormers on both sides and adjoining slant roof over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with flat moulding and small triangular fronton. Front façade with central door flanked with two and three windows on sides. Central balcony with stairs to street.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the characteristic funnel-shaped gables. Architectural historical value and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Ditto as a building which is part of one of the few existing
properties.construction_period: 19th Century

properties.name: Frederikstraat 16-18, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over façades. Front façade with three axes: three tall shutter doors on first floor and central door with flanking shutter windows on ground floor. Almost full-frontage balcony supported by two by two columns which form part of the fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the profiled cornice and mouldings and the wooden front balcony supported by columns. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 20-24, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey structure. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top end. Front façade with three axes: three tall shutter doors on first floor and central door with flanking shutter windows on ground floor. Gate next to façade with inward and outward curved wall and access to staircase to first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of i.a the funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top end and the typical gate. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core area and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Sp
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 30, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey structure. Hipped roofs parallel to street. Profiled cornice over façades, dentate coins on corners. Front façade laid out in five vertical axes. Triangular frontons above windows and doors. Almost full- frontage balcony supported by columns which form part of the fence.
properties.monument_value: Town planning and architectural historical value because of the prominent situation. Architectural historical value because of i.a the assembly of blocks of different size, the balanced façade lay-out with axes and the profiled cornices and triangular fro
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 34, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure set back from the street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery enclosed by two funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and oculus. Front façade with central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Town planning and architectural historical value because of the corner situation. Architectural historical value because of i.a the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 36-38, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure. Two hipped roofs with ridges parallel to the street. Cornice along all façades. Front façade: four tall windows on first floor, two doors and three windows in alternating sequence. Gate with triangular fronton on west side.
properties.monument_value: Town planning and architectural historical value because of the corner situation. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 5, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Front façade: central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core area and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 75A/B/C, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached structure with composite roof plan. One- storey front section: two parallel hipped roofs with ridges perpendicular to street. Two-storey rear section: hipped roof with ridge parallel to street. Cornice and fluted pilasters. Front terrace .
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the assembly of building blocks of different size . Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 86, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey concrete-built structure. Hipped roof with ridge perpendicular to street. Profiled cantilevered cornice supported by brackets. Symmetrical façade with central section with entrance door and two flanking bay windows forming two balconies on top.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a typical concrete-built two-storey urban dwelling with a hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape
properties.construction_period: First half of 20th century

properties.name: Frederikstraat 89, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached structure with composite roof plan. One- storey front section: two parallel hipped roofs with ridges perpendicular to street. Two-storey rear section: hipped roof with ridge parallel to street. Cornice over façades, fluted pilasters. Symmetrical front façade with two central doors and one window on each side.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the assembly of building blocks of different size, the symmetrical façade and the profiled cornice, mouldings and pilasters. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 91-93, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached corner structure with composite roof plan. Two-storey front section: two hipped roofs parallel to street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. One-storey rear section: side wings with gable roofs enclosing a patio. Wings connected by an aqueduct. Front façade laid out in three axes: central door with wooden balcony and flanking windows, three doors on ground floor, profiled cornice and dentate quoins.
properties.monument_value: Town planning and architectural historical value because of the corner situation. Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the typical assembly of building blocks of different size, the symmetrical façade, the shutter windows and the
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 94, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached one-storey structure with composite roof plan of hipped roofs. Front section: three hipped roofs parallel to street. Rear section: side wing structure with parallel hipped roofs perpendicular to street. Front façade laid out in three axes, front terrace. (Façade presently not revealed because of covered and enclosed terrace)
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditional structure with a composite roof plan of hipped roofs. Ditto because of the ridge ornaments and the mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Second half of 19th century

properties.name: Frederikstraat 96, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey corner structure. Steep hipped roof. Dormers with triangular fronton right above cornice on both sides of roof, one marked with star, the other with year 1857. Additional one-storey structures on premises with 19th century funnel-shaped gables. Front façade laid out in five axes with central doors and two flanking windows on each side, front balcony. Typical compound wall with gates.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a large urban mansion from the second half of the 19th century. Ditto because of the additional buildings and the compound wall. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 98-100, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey main structure and ditto addition. Main structure: three parallel hipped roofs over core area, front and rear gallery. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Façades with cornice. Front façade with central shutter door and shutter windows with weather mouldings. Additional structure: one continuous lean-to roof leaning against street wall. Typical garden wall.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the stone ridges and hips, cornice and mouldings, panelled shutter doors, shutter windows and the typical garden wall. Architectural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific val
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Freemasons' Lodge Igualdad
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey and symmetrically set up structure. Parallel gable roofs with dormers over core area and front gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. South façade with full-frontage terrace and stairs. Detached additional structure and cistern in yard. Two new side wings not included in Monuments Register.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of floor plan typical of Curaçao. Cultural historical value as seat of the Lodge Igualdad. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Momuments

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 12, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached, oblong one-storey structure. Gable roof perpendicular to street. Front façade: low gable with profiled moulding of gable rims, central panelled shutter doors and shutter windows with flat weather mouldings in block pattern
properties.monument_value: Specific value as a structure built in a sober and characteristic architecture. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 14-16, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large three-storey structure. Two hipped roofs parallel to street. Front façade laid out in three axes with windows on second floor and central door flanked with windows on first and ground floor. Wooden balcony on first floor. Neo-classicist rear façade with centrally positioned three- tiered portico with balconies on first and second floor and triangular fronton supported by Tuscan columns. Adjoining two-storey rear structure with roof chimney.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the portico with Tuscan columns and the triangular fronton. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 18-20, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-and-a-half storey corner structure. Gable roof with dormers over core area and adjoining slant roof over side gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and oculus in star-shaped plasterwork. Front façade laid out with window in gable top, two windows on first floor and two doors on ground floor. Marble tablet above left door with inscription '1857'and '361'.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the 19th century gables and the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: 19th Century

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 23-25, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top-end. Front façade laid out with three shutter windows on first floor and alternating shutter windows and shutter doors on ground floor, all with weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value as an example of a structure with a bentana, a selling window. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 24, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Gable roof with slightly lifted overhangs. Front façade with funnel-shaped gable, panelled door flanked by two windows, fluted pilasters on corners. West façade constructed in wood.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because it is one of the few preserved examples of a combination of a stonework front façade and a wooden side façade in the Alley Area in Otrobanda. Architectural historical and esthetical value beca
properties.construction_period: Not listed in register of Monuments

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 34, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi detached one-storey row-houses covered with one continuous broken slant roof. Row structure perpendicular to the street. Front façade with clamped door and window.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value as an example of low-cost urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 37, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure as part of a building block which includes nr. 39. One continuous gable roof. Funnel-shaped gable with flat 19th century top end. Profiled mouldings in front façade broken at separation line, is indication that the structure originally consisted of two parts.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as a structure built in a sober and characteristic architecture. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 39, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure as part of a building block which includes nr. 37. One continuous gable roof. Funnel-shaped gable with flat 19th century top end and oculus as centre of moulded star. Profiled mouldings in front façade is indication that the structure originally consisted of two parts.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as a structure built in a sober and characteristic architecture. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 52-54, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables placed on cornice. Oculus in star-and-circle plasterwork in gable top ends. Front façade with doors and windows positioned in five axes. Marble tablet with inscription '1836 308A'.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the 19th century funnel-shaped gables. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscap
properties.construction_period: 19th Century

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 7-15, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small corral compound. Two-storey main building covered with two parallel gable roofs. Plain gables and funnel- shaped gables at rear and front side respectively. Front façade: two doors with front balcony and flanking windows, all with fanlights and weather mouldings. Compound includes two service quarters (nr. 11-13) covered with a lean-to roof leaning to western wall of corral. Seriously damaged by fire in 2000.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the clear indication of different phases in the construction of the main building. Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a corral compound with a main building, yard and surrounding second
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 8-10, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large semi-detached two-storey composite structure. Main building and additional structures covered with gable roofs: main building with front gallery and ridge parallel to street, additions at the rear side positioned perpendicular to main building. Pointed gables with oculus. Front façade laid out with four windows on first floor and two doors and window on ground floor. Separate gate with access to premises.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of i.a the characteristic additions at the rear side. Architectural historical value and cultural historical value because of the floor plan of main block typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Gravenstraat 10, Otrobanda
