properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Hipped roof perpendicular to street. Cornice over all façades. Front façade with shutter door and window with profiled weather mouldings. Front wall of premises with four square pillars covered with pyramidal top.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Gravenstraat 4, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Three parallel gable roofs over main structure. Cornice along all façades. Stone wall around premises, entrance gate with two square pillars covered with pyramidal top.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Gravenstraat 8, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey kas di porchi, porch-house. Two hipped roofs perpendicular to street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Small built-in corner porch. Cornice along façades and wooden shutter windows with weather mouldings. Profiled pilasters on façade corners.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value as a unique housing type within the Inner City. Kas di porchi was almost exclusively built outside the city in the 1930's. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Habaaiweg 6, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with rectangular floor plan. Three hipped roofs parallel to street with cement hips and ridge with finials. Additions at rear side, a.o. cistern covered with hipped roof. Cornice over all façades. Front façade with central shutter door and flanking windows, dentate quoins on corners. Short front terrace.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a house with hipped roofs with a traditional design Ditto because of the soundness of the complex and the building details. Ditto because of typical cistern and additions. Specific va
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th century / first quarter of 20th

properties.name: Habaaiweg 8-10, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure containing two dwellings with rear kitchen additions and oven chimneys. One continuous gable roof parallel to street with concrete tile roofing. Funnel-shaped 20th-century gables with shoulders and flat moulding. Front façade laid out with one central door and flanking windows per dwelling.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a block of two low-cost houses covered by a gable roof. Ditto because of the 20th century funnel-shaped gables, and the ovens of the kitchen additions. Specific value as part of a pro
properties.construction_period: First quarter of 19th century

properties.name: Halman House
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure, main building of a corral with secondary structures. Gable roof over core area, slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Four dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and oculus in moulded star. Front façade with central door and three windows on both sides. Rear additions include kitchen with adjoining double cistern, and east wing. Former servants' quarters covered with one continuous slant roof along Zaantjessteeg. Surrounding walls with several gates in west and south wall.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as one of the few examples of the corral structure in the alley area of Otrobanda consisting of a main building and yard with secondary structures on the edges, and because of the floor plan with core
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hamelbergweg 1A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure. Hipped roof parallel to street. Cement hips and ridge with finials. Cornice over all façades. Front façade with built-in loggia on first floor and external staircase access. Loggia corner supported by double octagonal columns and ditto cantilevered capitals.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of an urban dwelling with loggia. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hendriksteeg 11-13, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to alley. Hipped roof with stone ridge and hips, and slightly lifted overhangs on its four sides. Stone wall with gate to premises and staircase access to first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical two-storey urban dwelling with a hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Hendriksteeg 19-23, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with a composite floor and roof plan. Front building equipped with central balcony with balustrade of fretwork bars. Second balcony at rear side with ditto balustrade supported by Tuscan columns. Arched aqueduct. Stone wall with gate to premises.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a spacious two-storey urban dwelling with hipped roofs. Ditto because of the coherence of the building masses, the balconies and the aqueduct. Specific value as part of a protected monumental towns
properties.construction_period: Second half of 19th century

properties.name: Hendriksteeg 7-9, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached structure with ridge parallel to alley. Gable roof with stone ridge enclosed by plain gables. Dormers at both sides of roof. Flat plain cornice bending up at ends. Horizontal band above door and window over full-frontage of front façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because a.o. the plain gables, dormers, lay-out of door and window and the full frontage horizontal band. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 10A -12, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached corner structure with main hipped roofs perpendicular to the street. One-and-a-half storey structure with basement. Front façade: three panelled shutter doors with moulded arched frames. Front terrace with balustrade and entrance stairs. Entrance gate flanked by square pillars topped with ornaments.
properties.monument_value: Town planning and architectural historical value because of its corner situation. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the assembly of building blocks, the plastered finishing and ornamentation of the windows, the front t
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 13-15, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-and-a-half storey corner structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjacent slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with oculus, profiled moulding and 19th century top end. Front façade with doors and windows positioned in four axes. Rear balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top end. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 16, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with T-shaped floor plan covered with hipped roofs. Cistern as a typical front addition. Front façade: shutter door and window with arched fanlights on first floor which open to a terrace formed by the cistern's roof. Profiled cornice over all façades. Stone garden wall with plain entrance flanked by square pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the cornice, the shutter doors and windows and the arched fanlights and mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 18, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached one-and-a-half storey oblong structure. Three parallel gable roofs with dormers over three adjacent blocks. Cornice and lower horizontal band over front and side façades. Dentate quoins on corners. Front façade: three adjoining funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and knob ornament. Central door and balcony. Front terrace with stairs.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because a.o. the typical composition of the three parallel gable roofs enclosed by funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 19, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Two hipped roofs parallel to street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades. Front façade: door and windows placed in four axes. Front terrace.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as an example of early 20th century architecture barely found in Hoogstraat. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Early 20th century

properties.name: Hoogstraat 20, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached structure with two-storey core area and one- storey front gallery. Hipped roof with cement hips, ridges and finials over core area and lean-to roof over front gallery. Cornice over façades, pilasters on corners of front façade. Front façade: three tall shutter windows on core façade; central shutter door and flanking shutter windows on gallery façade, all with profiled mouldings. Cistern placed against rear façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core and front gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 24, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Two dormers with triangular fronton, tall window and cheeks. Truncated gables with horizontal band below window ending in shoulders. Front façade: central door and flanking windows. Garden wall with stone openwork infill and entrance flanked by square pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 26, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure. Two hipped roofs parallel to street. Cornice over all façades, mouldings above all windows. Front façade: dentate quoins on corners, panelled shutter doors and windows placed in three axes. Almost full- frontage front balcony supported by columns ranging with the street. Staircase to first floor on side façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the symmetrical design, the doors and windows, the cornice and mouldings and the dentate quoins. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 27-31, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey main structure (nr.27-29) and secondary one-storey structure (nr.31). Main structure: three hipped roofs parallel to street. Cornice with drapery ornamentation, dentate quoins on corners. Front façade laid out in five axes with central balcony supported by columns. Triangular ornaments below window sills. Secondary structure: roof terrace enclosed by a closed stone parapet marked with a profiled moulding and a horizontal band connected with pilasters.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the cornice with drapery ornamentation (nr.27-29) and the typical parapet with mouldings and pilasters (nr.31). Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 28-30, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Gable roof with dormers over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Truncated gables with finials on top and horizontal band ending in shoulders. Front façade: full- frontage triangular fronton framed with decorated mouldings, medallion in centre. Central arched door with ditto flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because a.o. the truncated gables and the typical decorated triangular fronton. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core and front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. S
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 32-34, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure covered with three hipped roofs parallel to street. Profiled cornice over all façades, dentate quoins on corners. Front façade: shutter doors and tall shutter windows placed in three axes. Wooden balcony supported by four columns ranging with the street.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the symmetrical design with panelled doors and tall windows and the typical dentate quoins. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 33, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Hipped roof perpendicular to the street. Cement hips and ridge. Cornice over all façades. Moulding with bent ends above all openings. Deep- set door and windows. Similar design as adjacent structure Hoogstraat 37, except from direction of hipped roof.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the symmetrical design of the front façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 37, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure. Hipped roof parallel to Hoogstraat. Cement hips and ridge. Cornice over all façades. Moulding with bent ends above all openings. Deep- set door and windows. Similar design as adjacent structure Hoogstraat 33, except from direction of hipped roof.
properties.monument_value: Town planning and architectural historical value because of its prominent corner situation. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 38, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure in backyard of Hoogstraat 40. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials. Front façade: centrally positioned door flanked by tall windows with heavy profiled moulding.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the symmetrical design of the front façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 39-41, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-store corner structure. Hipped roofs with cement hips and ridge with finials. Front façade: decorated triangular fronton, balcony supported by four profiled columns with spaced bands. Terrace with Curaçao tiles. Side façade with stone staircase leading to balcony and door on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Town planning and architectural historical value because of its prominent corner situation. Architectural historical value because of typical elements a.o. the heavy cornice, the decorated triangular fronton, the profiled columns and the tiled terrace. Sp
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 40, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Gable roof with flat moulding. Front façade: profiled cornice running straight above doors and windows on first floor. Panelled shutter doors and shutter windows placed in three axes. Front balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the symmetrical design of the front façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 42, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Pyramidal roof with top ornament. Front façade ranging with the street. Centrally placed shutter door flanked with tall shutter windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the symmetrical design of the front façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 43, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with rectangular floor plan. Flat roof with a balustrade / parapet with stone openwork sections set between double marble pillars. Front façade: front terrace covered with projecting flat roof supported by four double columns with ball-shaped capitals. Cantilevered overhangs supported by consoles. Intricate detailed marble work.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because a.o. the typical use of materials such as: marble in different colours, Curaçao cement tiles, and ornaments such as: columns with ball-shaped capitals and the roof balustrade with pillars and ball-shap
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 44, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-and-a-half storey structure. Gable roof with two dormers with triangular fronton over core area and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Plain gables with oculus and tall window with moulding. Entrance on both ends of garden wall.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 49, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with front and rear additions. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials over main structure. Front façade: heavy profiled cornice, pilasters on corners. One-storey front addition with cornice and pilasters on corners. Flat roof forming a spacious balcony for the first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of typical elements such as a.o. the heavy cornice and the pilasters on the front façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 51, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey corner structure. Two parallel hipped roofs over core area and front gallery. Adjoining U- shaped hipped roof over rear gallery and flanking wings. Enclosed patio. All shutter windows on first floor equipped with arched fanlights. Heavy cornice over all façades, dentate quoins on front and side corners. Front façade: triangular fronton above cornice, decoration of medallion and flat triangles. Front terrace with stairs.
properties.monument_value: Town planning and architectural historical value because of the prominent situation on a corner. Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic composition of blocks and the typical ornaments such as the cornice, the tria
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 52, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure. Two parallel hipped roofs of different size with cement hips and ridges. Cornice over all façades. Front façade: central door and flanking windows with mouldings, profiled pilasters on corners. Front terrace with side stairs. External oven and chimney.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a dwelling with hipped roofs with a traditional design, and because of the presence of a traditional oven and chimney. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Hoogstraat 54, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure. Two parallel hipped roofs of different size with cement hips, ridges and finials. Cornice over all façades, profiled pilasters on corners. Front façade: central door and flanking windows with mouldings. Front terrace with stairs at sides.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a dwelling with hipped roofs with a traditional design. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Hotel Estoril
properties.characteristics: Two adjoined two-storey structures covered with gable and hipped roofs respectively. Heavy cornice. Front façade with two doors and balcony in asymmetrical position. One and three windows on sides of balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the 19th century gables and the composite system of roofs typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hotel Pelikaan
properties.characteristics: Large detached complex. Two adjoining two-storey structures. Hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges. Cornice over all façades. Two plain horizontal bands running above openings on ground and first floor. All façades laid out with doors and windows in vertical axes.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a double two-storey urban dwelling with hipped roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Second half of 19th century

properties.name: IJzerstraat 49-51, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Gable roof and plain gables with oculus. Adjoining structure at rear side and cistern. Plain cornices. Front façade: four windows with weather mouldings on first floor, alternating doors and windows on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in register of Monuments

properties.name: IJzerstraat 55, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure. Two hipped roofs parallel to the street. Plain cornice over all façades. Front façade: windows and central door on ground floor positioned in three axes. Gate with arched opening on west side giving access to staircase to balcony and entrance door on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic gate. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: IJzerstraat 57, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey corner structure which also includes Emmastraat 1-3. Hipped roofs parallel to Emmastraat with fluted chimney. Heavy profiled cornice over all façades and horizontal moulding. Quoins with block pattern on ground floor and dentate pattern on first floor. Façades laid out in axes, one axis in front façade and six axes in façade facing Emmastraat. Side access to first floor through gate and staircase.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic façade lay-out with doors and windows positioned in axes, and the typical fluted chimney. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: IJzerstraat 59, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure. Two parallel hipped roofs and a gable roof perpendicular to street. Heavy profiled cornice. Façades laid out in axes, three in front façade and five in each side façade. Front façade: triangular fronton with oculus and windows above cornice. Fluted moulded frame around openings. Balcony on first floor. Walled-in premises with entrances on IJzerstraat and Emmastraat.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic symmetrical façade lay-out with doors and windows positioned in axes, the fronton and the typical fluted frames around the openings. Specific value as part of a protected mon
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: IJzerstraat 61, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Hipped roof with finials. Cornice over façades and weather mouldings above all openings. Dentate quoins on corners. Front façade laid out in three axes, side façades in four and five axes respectively. Small one-storey addition at rear side. Front garden wall with square pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic symmetrical façade lay-out and such elements as the profiled cornice, quoins and weather mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: IJzerstraat 71-73, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey structure. Composite roof structure of hipped roofs. Front and side façades with small cornice, two full-frontage moulded bands below cornice and between ground and first floor. Front façade: six windows on first floor and alternating windows and doors on ground floor. Dentate quoins on corners.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because a.o. the façade lay- out with quoins, mouldings and bands. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kas di Alma Blou
properties.characteristics: Detached two-story structure with ridge parallel to street. Two parallel gable roofs enclosed by 19th century funnel-shaped gables. Three dormers on sides of roof. Adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Front façade: windows and doors laid out in five axes. Central balcony supported by columns. Five rhombic ornaments below cornice.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the typical 19th century funnel-shaped gables and the typical rhombic ornaments on the front façade. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kas di Kanchi
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure. Two parallel hipped roofs over two adjoining rectangular blocks of different length. U -shaped verandah with gingerbread fretwork around smaller block. Façades equipped with profiled cornice, weather mouldings and quoins on corners.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a dwelling with a traditional design. Ditto because of the verandah with typical gingerbread fretwork, rarely found on Curaçao. Ditto because of the premises' fence. Specific value as part of a pro
properties.construction_period: Second half of the 19th century

properties.name: Keizershof
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure. Three hipped roofs parallel to Hoogstraat. Front façade: windows with arched mouldings, portico supported by double columns and front terrace with balustrade of wooden fretwork. Projecting cornice with dentils over all façades. Dentate quoins on corners. Wooden balcony over full frontage of rear façade supported by plain columns.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the portico with terrace and typical arched mouldings above door and windows of the front façade, the tall shutter windows and panelled shutter doors, and the rear balcony supported by columns. Specific value

properties.name: Keizershof
properties.characteristics: Detached two storey double structure covered with two similar parallel hipped roofs. Projecting profiled cornice, pilasters on corners. Façades divided by pilasters and a horizontal band,. During restoration a balcony was placed over the short front terrace to fit the four panelled shutter doors on the first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the profiled cornice and mouldings, the pilasters and the panelled shutter doors and windows. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Keizershof
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure accommodating two separate buildings with a narrow space in between. Two hipped roofs parallel to street, covered central corridor. Cornice over all façades. Front façade laid out in three axes with central panelled shutter door flanked by shutter windows, both on ground and first floor. Central wooden balcony with balusters made from wooden fretwork.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical panelled shutter doors, tall shutter windows and characteristic wooden balcony. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Klein Curacaostraat 5, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey partly concrete-built structure. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge and eaves. Front façade with wooden boarding. Panelled shutter door in centre flanked by shutter windows. All openings with rectangular fanlights and arched weather profile. Side façade with plastered wooden boarding
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a modest dwelling partly built up in concrete and in wood. Ditto because of the typical windows and plastered boarding side façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First half of 20th century

properties.name: Klipstraat 11, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Gable roof with dormers over core area and slant roof over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Symmetrical façade lay-out. Gate to backyard. Front fence with low walls and two entrances.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in register of Monuments

properties.name: Klipstraat 19, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Two parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges. Profiled cornice over all façades. Front addition without monumental value.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the heavy, profiled cornice and the shutter windows with profiled weather mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kortijn K 36, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over front façade only. Symmetrical front façade ranging with alley. Panelled shutter door and shutter windows without weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: 19th century

properties.name: Kortijn K18, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached concrete-built one-storey structure. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges. Profiled cornice over façades. Symmetrical front façade. Door and flanking windows with weather mouldings and pseudo consoles.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a concrete-built dwelling with hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First half of 20th century

properties.name: Kortijn K22, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey concrete-built corner structure. Hipped roof with stone hips and ridge. Projecting cornice, profiled on street façades. Windows with weather mouldings and pseudo consoles. Entrance through built-in porch. Concrete cistern against rear façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a concrete-built porch dwelling with hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First half of 20th century

properties.name: Kortijn K3-K4, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-and-a-half-storey structure with the prominence of a country estate. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front and rear galleries. Cross wing with gable roof intersecting main block. 18th century funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and semicircular fronton as top end. Cornice over facades of cross wing. Cistern with aqueduct. Structure was restored in 1986, a.o. dentate coins added.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a rare 18th century two-storey dwelling. Ditto because of the unusual size and design. Ditto because of its location, originally in an open area, nowadays in a built-up urban area. Sp

properties.name: Kortijnweg 15, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached, slightly deep-set one-storey structure. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Two parallel hipped roofs with corrugated iron roofing and finials. Cornice over front façade only. Stone-built front façade with symmetrical lay-out. Door and flanking windows with plain weather mouldings. Side façade: wooden boarding.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest wooden dwelling with stone-built front façade and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First half of 20th century

properties.name: Kortijnweg 21, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure ranging with thee street. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Two hipped roofs parallel to street with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over façades. Front façade with symmetrical lay-out. Door and flanking windows without weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, traditional dwelling, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First half of 20th century

properties.name: Kortijnweg 23, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure ranging with the street. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Hipped roof parallel to street with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade: flat cornice with rhombic decorations. Door and three windows with tunnel-shaped weather mouldings. Side façade: wooden boarding with closed, plastered joints.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest traditional dwelling with hipped roof and wooden side façade, and as part of a ribbon development. Ditto because of decorated cornice and finishing of joints in boarding. Spe
properties.construction_period: First half of 20th century

properties.name: Kortijnweg 25, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached one-storey structure ranging with the street. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Hipped roof parallel to street with cement hips and ridges with finials, and overhangs at eaves. Front façade with three windows. Side entrance.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, traditional stone-built dwelling, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First half of 20th century

properties.name: Kortijnweg 29, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure ranging with the street. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Two hipped roofs parallel to street with cement hips and ridges with finials. Symmetrical front façade with cornice continuing over side-gate to backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, traditional stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First half of 20th century

properties.name: Kortijnweg 33, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure in bend of street. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Two hipped roofs parallel to street with cement hips and ridges with finials. Symmetrical front façade with cornice, lacking on other façades. Side-entrance with access to backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, traditional stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First half of 20th century

properties.name: Kortijnweg 35, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Wooden dwelling with stone- built front façade. Two gable roofs parallel to street, gables finished with boarding. Side-gate with access to backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, wooden dwelling with stone-built front façade and gable roofs, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First half of 20th century

properties.name: Kortijnweg 37, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Hipped roof parallel to street with cement hips and ridges with finials. Symmetrical front façade with cornice, lacking on other façades. Side- gate with access to backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, traditional stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First half of 20th century

properties.name: Kortijnweg 43, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Hipped roof parallel to street with cement hips and ridges with finials. Symmetrical front façade with corner pilasters and cornice, the latter lacking on the other façades. Short fence walls on sides with entrance to backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, traditional stone-built dwelling with hipped roof, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Kortijnweg 45, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure in bend of street. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Wooden dwelling with stone-built front façade and small plain moulding. Gable roof parallel to street with cement ridge and finials, gables finished with boarding. Short wall fences on sides and side-gate with pointed gable.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, wooden dwelling with stone-built front façade and gable roof, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Kortijnweg 47-49, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two small detached one-storey structures. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Two hipped roofs, parallel and perpendicular to street, with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façades with cornice, door and step (nr.47), and door and three windows (nr.49). Wooden side façade (nr.47)
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, traditional stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Kortijnweg 5, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure ranging with the street. One of the oldest buildings of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Gable roof over core and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables. Front façade with symmetrical lay-out. Door and flanking windows with plain weather mouldings. External oven with chimney.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest traditional stone-built dwelling in ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: 19th / 20th century

properties.name: Kortijnweg 53, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Gable roof parallel to street, gables with flat top ends. Front façade with cornice and symmetrical lay-out. Door and windows with tunnel-shaped weather mouldings. Short wall fences at sides with entrance to backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, traditional stone-built dwelling with a gable roof, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Kortijnweg 57, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Wooden dwelling with stone- built front façade. Two gable roofs parallel to street covered with corrugated iron roofing. No cornice. Short wall fences with side-gate to backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, wooden dwelling with stone-built front façade and gable roofs, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Kortijnweg 58, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached concrete-built one-storey structure with adjoining front and rear additions. Pyramidal roof with finial over square floor plan. Front façade: porch with balustrade of cast cement elements and Curaçao tile flooring. Three sided bay window.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a characteristic and sound example of a concrete-built dwelling dating from the second quarter of the 20th century. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Around second quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Kortijnweg 63, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Partly stone-built and partly wooden facades. Hipped roof parallel to street with cement hips and ridges with finials. Slightly lifted eaves. Symmetrical front façade with door and flanking windows. Short wall fences on sides with entrance to backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, traditional, partly stone-built and partly wooden dwelling with a hipped roof, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscap
properties.construction_period: Around 1900

properties.name: Kranshi Bieuw
properties.characteristics: Large detached one-storey structure set back from building line. H-shaped floor plan covered with three hipped roofs. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Continuing profiled cornice over façades, dentate quoins on corners. Front façade: central shutter door flanked with three shutter windows with weather mouldings on both sides. Two shutter windows on each wing. Large covered cistern with two arched aqueducts behind west wing.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical large building with hipped roofs and a typical floor plan rarely found on Curaçao. Ditto because of the large cistern and aqueducts. Specific value as part of a protected monumental towns
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th century.

properties.name: Kura di Shon Fil main building
properties.characteristics: Large detached one-storey structure, main building of corral Kura di Shon Fil. Structure includes a portico with stairs, a small front section with two, and an adjoining wider section with three parallel hipped roofs. The sets of roofs are placed perpendicular to each other and are equipped with cement hips and ridges with finials. Rear side: terrace with cistern and two structures with service quarters.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the front façade with portico and the typical standard details. Cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Cultural historical value as part of one of the few existing examples of
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura di Shon Ki
properties.characteristics: Corral compound with main building and open yard surrounded by secondary structures. Main structure with gable roof over core area. Four dormers with moulded triangular top end on each side of roof. Front gallery interrupted by a two-storey structure. Adjoining side wing. Front terrace with stone balustrade and stairs to yard. Servants quarters with one continuous lean-to roof leaning to front wall of premises. Two cisterns.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical 18th century inward and outward curved gables, dormers and the front terrace with Ysselsteen masonry. Ditto because of the floor plan of the main building, typical of Curaçao. Cultural historical
properties.construction_period: 18th Century

properties.name: Kura di Shon Toms
properties.characteristics: Large walled-in corral compound. Two-storey main building with hipped roof and one-storey front, side and rear gallery. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade: core area with four tall windows and front gallery with alternating doors and windows. Walled-in front terrace with stairs to yard. Additional structures include a cistern and service quarters covered with a lean-to roof leaning to wall of corral. Similar small structure at the corral entrance. Access to main building lined with low stone walls.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the floor plan of the main building typical of Curaçao. Cultural historical value as a building which is part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral-structure typical of Otrobanda. Specific value as
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure, servants' quarters of former corral of demolished structure Langestraat 10-12. Gable roof and funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure with square floor plan. Pyramidal roof with cement hips and finial. Profiled cornice over façades. Front façade: first floor with two tall shutter windows and weather mouldings, ground floor with clamped door. Side façade: oven and chimney, staircase to balcony and entrance door on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the prominent situation on the corner of Langestraat and IJzerstraat. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with H-shaped floor plan. Gable roof over main section, separate gable roofs over four adjoining structures. Funnel-shaped gables with oculus. Cistern with slant roof in backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as an assembly of various adjoining buildings, all covered with separate gable roofs.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure, part of building complex Langestraat 40-54. Slant roof with high end towards yard. Clamped door and shutter in long and short façades.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached structure consisting of four row-houses. Part of building complex Langestraat 40-54. Slant roof with high end towards yard. Two dwellings with door, other two with door and window.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure. Part of building complex Langestraat 40-54. Gable roof with dormers over core area, adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top end and oculus. Mark with year 1861. Front façade laid out in three axes. Full- frontage plain cornice and horizontal band above first floor windows. Cistern in backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the 19th century building elements and details. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure. Part of building complex Langestraat 40-54. Gable roof with dormers over core area and slant roof over adjoining rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and oculus. Front façade with full-frontage plain cornice and horizontal band above first floor windows. Wooden board with inscription 'N30 A 1855'. Rear gallery with chimney and oven.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey structure. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends marked with year 1857. Profiled cornice over front and west façade. Front façade with doors and windows laid out in three axes, two full-frontage horizontal bands between rows of windows. Sash windows in interior wall separating core and galleries. Cistern with aqueduct and additional two-storey structure in backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the 19th century building elements and details, and the sash windows between core and galleries. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structures. Lean-to roof leaning to front wall ranging with IJzerstraat. Roof chimney at rear side. Front façade: plain street wall with shutter door and shutter windows.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-and-a-half storey structure with basement. Gable roof with dormers and funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Oculus above tall shutter window with weather moulding. Two panelled doors with wooden shutters in front façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of such elements as a.o. the gables with 19th century top end and oculus, and the panelled doors. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure. Core area with gable roof and dormers, galleries with slant roofs on three sides of structure. Funnel-shaped gables with plain top end. Roof chimney on western gallery. Between structure and IJzerstraat nr.10-12 original stepped rubble stone street pavement.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. its characteristic location in the upper part of sloping IJzerstraat. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with galleries typical of Curaçao. Specifi
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: One-storey structures originally part of semi-detached set of four row-houses (nrs.2-8) One continuous lean-to roof leaning to front wall ranging with IJzerstraat. Front façades: plain street wall with two clamped wooden entrance doors. Small cistern and aqueduct on south façade. (Dwelling nr.6 was demolished to make way for a connection between IJzerstraat and Klipstraat)
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as simple low-cost housing with a traditional design. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: One-and-a half storey structure built against neighbouring properties and ranging with alleyway. Part of corral with 'Bellevue' as main structure. Double slant roof. Front façade: central door flanked by tall windows, profiled cornice and weather mouldings above openings, pilasters on corners. Small tower-shaped addition at rear side.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached structure containing three small one-storey row-houses. Part of corral with 'Bellevue' as main structure. One continuous lean- to roof leaning to the wall ranging with IJzerstraat. Each dwelling equipped with chimney. Front façade: plain street wall with clamped entrance door and ditto window for each dwelling.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as structures which are part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral-structure of Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure ranging with alley. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials. Front façade: centrally placed panelled shutter door flanked by two windows with weather mouldings, front cornice with moulding of small blocks. Side access to premises through gate with triangular fronton.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of such elements as a.o. the ornamented front cornice and the front façade with symmetrical lay-out. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape and because its prominent position in IJzerstraat.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Large semi-detached two-storey structure with composite roof plan. Front façade: panelled shutter doors and windows positioned in five axes, profiled cornice and full-frontage horizontal band. Framed tablet with inscription 'no.38-40 1915'. East façade: six tall windows with weather mouldings on first floor and five windows on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of tablet with date on structure, the panelled doors and the shutter windows. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure. Gable roof over core area, slant roofs over galleries on three sides. Eaves on slant roofs on front and west side. Dormer with triangular fronton on both sides of gable roof. Front façade with panelled shutter door and two shutter windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the rarely found slant roofs with eaves. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with galleries typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental to
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Hipped roof with finials. Rear and side additions. Profiled cornice on front and side façades, otherwise plain cornice. Façades: shutter windows with mouldings above and below the window frames, panelled door with side lights. Front wall of garden with gate and clamped door.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. such elements as the cornice and the window mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape and because of the structure's prominence in the townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure containing two dwellings with IJzerstraat 62 slightly set back from street. Part of corral with IJzerstraat 64 as main building. One continuous lean-to roof which leans to front wall ranging with IJzerstraat. Front façade: plain street wall with shutter doors and windows and plain weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value as part of one of the old corrals of Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure located in yard. Main building of corral including structures IJzerstraat 60-62 and 70-74. Hipped roof with finials over core area and lean- to roofs over one-storey side galleries. Panelled doors with shutters and shutter windows. High corral separation walls along north, east and south side of corral. Entrance gate between IJzerstraat 60-62 and 70-74.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of such elements as a.o. the panelled doors, the shutter windows and the monumental entrance gate. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with galleries typica
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Detached structure accommodating three one-storey row- houses. Part of corral with IJzerstraat 64 as main building. Southern part with lean-to roof leaning on street wall, northern part with continuous gable roof and separation walls protruding above roofing. Front façade: plain street wall with shutter windows (nr.70) and façade with plain cornice, shutter doors and windows with plain weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value as part of a corral typical of Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: One-storey structure originally part of a semi-detached set of four row-houses (nrs.2-8) Lean-to roof leaning to front wall ranging with IJzerstraat. Front façade: plain street wall with clamped wooden entrance door and ditto tall window. (Dwelling nr.6 was demolished to make way for a connection between IJzerstraat and Klipstraat)
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as low-cost housing with a traditional design. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over side galleries. Funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top end. Additions to east and west façades and additional structures on premises a.o. a cistern and aqueduct. Front façade: cornice and full-frontage dentils, shutter windows and doors. Marble tablet with inscription: '1855, 1e wijk. 66'.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with galleries typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Detached double structure made up of two connected identical two-storey wooden structures. Two external staircases to first floor, one separating both structures. Two parallel hipped roofs with overhangs; corrugated iron roofing. Front façade of each unit: cantilevered triangular fronton with profiled frame supported by five sawn and decorated consoles. Shutter doors on first floor opening to full-frontage wooden balconies supported by four cut consoles. Central door flanked by tall windows on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because wooden houses of this type and size are rare on Curaçao. Architectural historical and esthetical value because of such elements as a.o. the typical frontons, the wooden consoles and balconies, and the shutter doors a
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure situated off the street. Two in line, joined gable roofs enclosed by funnel-shaped gables. Adjoining gallery covered with slant roof.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Museum
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure. Three parallel hipped roofs over core area and front and rear gallery. Front façade: door and windows placed in four axes. Windows on first floor with inverted ogee arch below window sills, door and windows on ground floor with arched tympanum containing masonry mosaic. Profiled pilasters on corners. Two-storey structure at rear side covered with pyramidal roof.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of the characteristic ornamentation of door and windows. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Museum
properties.characteristics: Detached mainly two-storey assembly of different building blocks. Main structure covered with two gable roofs enclosed by funnel-shaped gables with19th century top ends; oculus in plastered star. Dormers on roof. Additional structures with gable and slant roofs. East façade: sash windows with glass bars. South façade: above door medallion with inscription '57 1861'.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of the complexity of the structure. Ditto because, together with the structures nrs.10-12 and nrs.16-20, it forms a characteristic and compact cul-de-sac with the original rubble stone street pavement.

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Museum
properties.characteristics: Complex of L-shaped and rectangular two-storey detached structures. L-shaped building covered with hipped roof and dormers with inward and outward curved top end, consoles and cheeks. Stairs to first floor with Ysselsteen masonry. Façade facing Sint Annabaai with arched gallery.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the typical dormers, the characteristic balconies supported by columns, the use of Ysselsteen bricks for the stairs and the gate with flat arch. Architectural historical and cultural historical
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monumentts

properties.name: L.B. Smithplein 12, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Identical to adjacent structure L.B. Smithplein 14. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders, 19th century top end. Front façade with cornice and symmetrical lay-out. Roof chimney.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a dwelling with a traditional design and gable roof. Ditto because of the funnel-shaped gable and the chimney. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th century / first quarter of 20th

properties.name: L.B. Smithplein 14, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Identical to adjacent structure L.B. Smithplein 12. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders, 19th century top end. Front façade with cornice and symmetrical lay-out. Roof chimney.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a dwelling with a traditional design and gable roof. Ditto because of the funnel-shaped gable and the chimney. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th century / first quarter of 20th

properties.name: L.B. Smithplein 4, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached deep-set two-storey structure with rectangular floor plan. Hipped roof with ridge parallel to square. Heavy profiled projecting cornice with consoles. Front façade laid out in three axes. Front entrance with portico with fluted Doric columns supporting an entablature and tympanum.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a two-storey urban dwelling with a hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th century

properties.name: L.B. Smithplein 6-8, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two detached structures forming one building complex. One- storey front structure and two-storey rear structure separated by an open two-storey gallery with staircases at both ends. Structures covered with three hipped roofs, parallel and perpendicular to square respectively. Central path to front entrance in axis of complex paved with red bricks and lined with low guiding walls of stone openwork set between pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a dwelling with a traditional design and an urban two-storey dwelling. Cultural historical value as the former residence of L.B. Smith. Specific value as part of a protected monumenta
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th century

properties.name: La Bonanza
properties.characteristics: Complex made up of three two-storey structures. Nr.33: ridge perpendicular to street. Gable roof with hipped end over rectangular floor plan. Front façade: triangular fronton with profiled moulding and dentils, fluted corner pilasters. Nr. 35-37: ridge parallel to street. Gable roof with dormers over core area and slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Inward and outward curved 18th century gable. Wooden balcony over front and side façade. Nr.41: situated in backyard. Gable roof with dormers over core area, slant roof over front gallery.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of such elements as a.o. the fronton with ornamented mouldings, fluted pilasters on corners, the inward and outward curved gable, the weather mouldings with consoles, and the wooden balcony along the f
properties.construction_period: 18th and 19th century

properties.name: La Moda de Paris
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure covered with hipped roof. Front façade with plain cornice and a frieze with name of shop 'La Moda de Paris' in plasterwork. Interior with staircase to wooden gallery following the interior walls on the first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the characteristic late-19th century façade with name of shop and typical interior shop gallery. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: La Moda de Paris
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure covered with hipped roof. Front façade with plain cornice and a frieze with name of shop 'La Moda de Paris' in plasterwork. Doors and windows on ground floor shut off with folding panelled doors, panels with diagonal lathwork.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the characteristic late-19th century façade with name of shop and typical folding panelled doors. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Lopez de Morlastraat 2, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Two parallel hipped roofs with hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades. Front façade symmetrically laid out with door and flanking windows with weather mouldings. Side entrance with elegant door to backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical stone-built traditional urban dwelling with hipped roofs. Ditto because of the side entrance. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Lopez de Morlastraat 4, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Hipped roof perpendicular to street with hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades. Front façade symmetrically laid out with door and flanking windows with weather mouldings. Detached oven with chimney at rear side of dwelling.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical stone-built traditional urban dwelling with a hipped roof. Ditto because of the detached oven. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Luna Blou complex
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure built on half-storey basement. Hipped roof with heavy cornice over all façades and topped with stone ornaments at roof corners. Front façade with entrance door and windows laid out in three axes. Full frontage balcony with balustrade of stone openwork.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical ornamented cornice. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Luna Blou complex
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Two gable roofs parallel to street. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end, the front one with small window and the rear one with oculus. Eastern side façade with wooden balcony and staircase access.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Mi Rancho
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey dwelling. Three parallel hipped roofs, the two front roofs smaller than the rear one. Roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade with ornate cornice and weather mouldings, quoins on corners. Central door and flanking windows, all provided with fanlights. Fence with square stone pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural and cultural historical value as an example of a traditional medium-sized dwelling covered with hipped roofs. Ditto because of ornate cornice and weather mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Molenplein 12-19, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-and-a-half storey structure with rectangular floor plan. Gable roof with dormers over core area and slant roofs over surrounding galleries. Inward and outward curved gables with semicircular top end and heavy curls at lower ends. Central transverse section with gable roofs. Front façade: entrance on first floor with two symmetrically placed L-shaped stairs to front door and balcony. All four galleries have sash windows on first floor and arch decorations on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic 18th century inward and outward curved gables and arches. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value
properties.construction_period: Around 1750

properties.name: Molenplein z/n, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached mainly two-and-a-half storey structure with U-shaped floor plan. Gable roof over core area enclosed with inward and outward curved gables and slant roof over front gallery. Two transverse wings with gable roof closed with funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Small two storey addition built against front façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic inward and outward curved gables. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected m
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Monte Bellosraat 19-27, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached set of five one-storey row-houses. One continuous gable roof over all units enclosed with plain funnel-shaped gables. Identical façade lay-out for each dwelling which consists of a clamped door flanked by ditto windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of low-cost urban row-housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th /first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Monte Bellosraat 35, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-and-a-half storey corner structure ranging with street. Gable roof. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and 19th century top end. Plain cornice over façades. Front façade with dormer above cornice. Central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a stone-built dwelling with a traditional design and hipped roofs. Ditto because of the funnel-shaped gables. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th century

properties.name: Monte Bellosraat 7-9, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey concrete-built structure. Two parallel hipped roofs over small front and larger rear section. Roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades. Symmetrical front façade with pilasters on corners. Concrete cistern in backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a concrete-built dwelling with a traditional design and hipped roofs. Ditto because of the cistern. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: First half of 20th century

properties.name: Naniesteeg 23, Otrobanda
